website_summaries.verdict: Larger than average HDPE bucket that ships with a secure gamma seal lid.
pros: With 7 gallons of capacity, this is a larger bucket than the standard 5-gallon option
These HDPE materials are compatible to use with a freezer
Can accept materials as hot as 190°F
Multiple ribs at the top and 100-mil thickness allow the bucket to maintain its shape and integrity
cons: Large bucket could use an extra handle at the bottom for easier lifting

customer_reviews.title: The seal leaks water.
customer_reviews.text: I use these buckets to make canister filters for aquariums. These buckets with gamma eals do not seal tight to hold water. They leak around the seal lid bad.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product! Lid does not seal properly.
customer_reviews.text: The gamma lid outer ring doesn't seat/lock on securely. The entire lid assembly lifts off with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this product the top is definitely not air tight or water tight
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits 50lbs of wheat berries!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Glad I found this, and I'm sure I'll be buying at least 1 more. 50 lbs of wheat berries fit in this bucket and the lid is easy to get off. I can also buy a gamma seal, twist off lid for the bucket if I want too, but I dont think I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Walnut Farm Designs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well constructed bucket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for food storage (FDA approved resin), this bucket is heavy duty and well constructed. Almost like the buckets you get from your hardware store, except a bit more sturdy (not to mention larger [7 gal]). The lid is similar to what you have on tupperware containers, and is super easy to put on and pull off, no tools required. It holds liquid in just fine, though I wouldn't turn the bucket upside down while filled. Overall, great quality bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from a camping trip in our Teardrop camper, which does not have a bathroom. We use a shower tent for a changing place and to keep a portable toilet. We had read lots of blogs saying a bucket with a seat and lined with a strong trash bag and sprinkled with kitty litter works great and can be disposed of in the trash instead of using the toilet which has to be taken to the dump station, emptied and cleaned. We ordered this bucket instead of a 5 gallon because it is a bit taller. I must say, it works really well. Sturdy and takes less floor space than the portable toilet we have.
customer_reviews.author: Poli

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The whole point in purchasing this particular product was that it needed to be tall enough to fit a particular tool and still be able to fit the cover on for safe, clean storage. This product is available in a variety of sizes and heights, but this tall one is exactly what was needed to hold our particularly tall tools and still snap the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Do It Yourselfer - Acton MA

customer_reviews.title: Durable bucket that is being used to hold water for drip irrigation
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a gravity drip irrigation system that I am putting together with another 2 buckets. Comes with a lid that fits fine. Picked this over the standard 5 gallon buckets. Arrived with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket, but lid no good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this bucket for fermenting wine. I am not impressed at all with the Gamma lids. Hard to fit the holding/mounting ring onto the bucket, even used a rubber mallet to ensure that it was on tight. It would not make an airtight seal, I even resorted to using silicone sealant to try to seal the gap between the outside of the bucket and the mounting ring. I applied vaseline on the "O" ring on the screw on lid to make sure it sealed well, also. Very frustrating and not worth the effort to make it air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dawkem

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for compost
customer_reviews.text: I use this tall pail for kitchen compost. It really heats the compost up and the lid fits securely. Once it's full I'll bury the contents in the raised beds and start again. So far it has not leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and the included lid goes on and off securely with normal effort. I expect it to last for many years. Good value for less than thirty bucks.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bombe

customer_reviews.title: Nice tall buckets.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and nice and tall. My only complaint is the small white plastic handle cover for carrying could be a bit thicker. When full of water, you can feel the metal handle right through the small plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: RV Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store all the RV black tank pipes etc. Works great. Tall enough to hold everything in one bucket. Came with a lid which is watertight also.
customer_reviews.author: S. Naqvi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bucket. It holds a full 7 gallons. I use it to premix water and plant food for my hydroponics.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Robson

customer_reviews.title: Great gadening seat and tool storage
customer_reviews.text: Works well as tall gardening seat and tool storage. Porta potty with added seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Size is wrong, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Needed for a specific purpose, the container needed to be just 12 inches inside diameter. I found measurements for the 7gal bucket recorded as 12 inches or more in two places, but the container is barely 11-1/4 inside. Sturdy but useless to me. It's the same as a 5gal bucket but taller. Will try to repurpose it.
customer_reviews.author: SC shopper

customer_reviews.title: Needed a 7 gallon bucket and got a good 7 gallon bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Use it every week to soak my pool filter in. The one they gave me was too short!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Size is very nice, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and capacity bucket
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a bucket that can take more than 5 gallons. The quality of the bucket is outstanding too. I use it daily in my job as a road technician. It definitely saves me some time instead of keep going back and disposing my waste oil in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: The service was excellent from the provider. The bucket is what you would expect. It's a bucket. Good shape, no deformities, 7 Gal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ziliak

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bucket
customer_reviews.text: The lid is not airtight like it suggests had to use a sealer
customer_reviews.author: R. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for holding dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding whatever you may need. We have our dog food in it and the lid keeps the food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for taking showers while camping and it's strong enough to accommodate most household chores as well. Although a tad uncomfortable, it does make an extra place to sit when needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Monika Phillips

product_meta.title: Hudson Exchange Premium 7 Gallon Bucket with Gamma Seal Lid, HDPE, White
product_meta.description: These 7 gallon white HDPE buckets are extremely tough. 100 mil construction allow for these buckets to be used over and over again. Sturdy wire bail with a plastic handgrip is attached to the bucket. Practical fill is 7. 00 gal. (26. 50 liters) and overflow fill is 7. 39 gal. (27. 97 liters). Meets fda standards. Can be used to pick up baseballs after a game. Package contains one bucket and one Gamma Seal lid.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
